    • Method Detail

      • insertArtistFromAudioDB

        public Artist insertArtistFromAudioDB(java.lang.String artistName,
                                      Library library)
        Parameters:
        artistName - artist name
        library - music library
        Returns:
        artist / null This finds an artist in the current library as well as AudioDB and automatically fill in missing details of that song based on artist name. This returns an artist object if there is one that has been found, otherwise returns null. PLEASE NOTE: If the artist already exists in the library, then this also returns null.

      • insertAlbumFromAudioDB

        public Album insertAlbumFromAudioDB(Artist artist,
                                    java.lang.String releaseDate,
                                    Library library)
        Parameters:
        artist - artist
        releaseDate - album release date
        library - music library
        Returns:
        album / null This finds an album in the current library as well as AudioDB and automatically fill in missing details of that song based on the artist name and album release date. This returns an album object if there is one that has been found, otherwise returns false. PLEASE NOTE: If the album already exists in the library, then this also returns null.

      • selectAlbum

        public Album selectAlbum(java.util.ArrayList<Album> duplicatedAlbums,
                         java.lang.String artistName)
        Parameters:
        duplicatedAlbums - arrayList of albums
        artistName - artist name
        Returns:
        album / null This shows at most 5 qualified albums found in AudioDB to users and let users decide which one they want to keep This return an album object if users chose one, otherwise returns null.
